step: FIX AppointmentList.test.js to use robust queries for cell content
sub_steps: Identify all assertions/selectors using getByTestId('reason-cell-11') or similar brittle patterns for the appointment reason cell.
Replace these with more robust queries: use screen.getByText with the expected reason string instead, or combine queries such as screen.getAllByTestId('reason-cell').
Verify that the tests uniquely locate and assert on the appropriate table cell or element, using either the text content or by narrowing the scope (for example, within a particular row).
If using getAllByTestId, iterate through them and match the cell with the expected appointment reason per test case.
Rerun the test file (or relevant command) after edits to confirm resolution of 'not found' and ambiguity errors.
description: This step resolves the React Testing Library test selector issue by making cell content assertions robust against DOM shape changes, enabling tests to find cells reliably and consistently.

step: Build, lint, and run test suite for frontend React app.
sub_steps: Run 'npm install' in /reactapp to ensure dependencies are installed.
Run 'npm run build' to verify project compiles cleanly.
Run 'npx eslint src/ --fix' to auto-fix/lint source code.
Run 'npm run test:ci' to execute all Jest tests non-blockingly.
description: Verifies that all code compiles, is properly styled/linted, and that all required test cases are passing for the React/Jest portion before submission.
